title: Dow on Track to Finish Best Month in Over Three Decades
sub_head: Stocks have soared in November, briefly pushing the blue-chips index over 30000 for the first time in its history
body:
U.S. stocks are on track to complete a banner November, giving the Dow Jones Industrial Average its best month in over 33 years, as investors cheer the prospect of Covid-19 vaccines halting the pandemic and fresh stimulus spending to bolster the economy.
Futures tied to the Dow ticked down 0.5% Monday, signaling that the blue-chips index will enter the final trading session of November down about 140 points. The benchmark was up roughly 12.9% month-to-date by the end of Friday.
Contracts...
